entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
